oai_dc:dc.dc:title: An Estimated Prevalence and Distribution of Anaplasmosis in a Subpopulation of Alabama Cattle
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Rodning, S. P.
Rowe, S. E.
Smith, Lisa
Gard, J. A.
Hoerr, F. J.
Frazier, T. G.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Anaplasma marginale
geographical distribution
clinical
subclinical
prevalence
survey
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A prospective survey was conducted to estimate the prevalence and geographical distribution of cattle infected with Anaplasma marginale throughout Alabama to gain a greater understanding of the risk anaplasmosis poses to the Alabama cattle industry.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 2010; 242
